TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted there are all to kill you.

I wish for a basic muffin.

Granted, but is too bland for your liking.

I wish that I could ignore gravity.

Granted you are in a vacuum ,and you die because of it.

I wish for a muffin.

Granted you are in a vacuum ,and you die because of it.

I wish for a muffin.

Granted, your muffin is rotten

I wish for more NASA funding

Granted ,but they use it to make flags that look bad.

I wish for a muffin.

Granted, but you are beaten to death with it.

I wish for a cupcake.

Granted ,but it not that kinda cupcake.

I wish for a muffin.

Granted. It has ricin in it.

I wish for immunity to the world's venoms and poisons.

Granted, you're poisoned by other-worldly venoms.

I wish for PfL

Granted ,but as bad as i want to i can't sadly happen in this universe.

I wish rage to be more active in the game section to ruin my rule over the games game section.

Granted, but I follow him and really mess things up for you.

I wish good things didn't have to end.

Granted, and not corrupted.

I wish for PfL to be back...

Granted. NOOYC rules over it.

I wish for the ability to make people randomly feel horrible pain.

Granted. To make it work you feel it double yourself.

I wish people would go play.

Granted but it using rocket science from kerbals space program.*boom* look it worked.

I wish for a muffin.

Granted. I laced it with cyanide.

I wish for the most recent version of Photoshop.

Granted, but now Photoshop is a actual retail store business where you can edit photos. Your new ownership of the newest model of store ends up being horrible and you are forced to foreclose it.

I wish that I didn't have fingerprints so that I could be a superspy .

Edited June 15, 2013 by (An Original Name)

Granted, but you constantly have bad gas now.

I wish to not have a corrupted wish.

Granted. Or not granted. You are now Schodigner's cat.

I wish for total silence for five minutes in a row.

Granted, but all of the sound anywhere that was going to be made if not for the 5 minutes of silence is suddenly released after the silence ends in a massive, collective noise. Everything with ears instantly goes deaf.

I wish for a snipper riffle.

Granted. It's pointed at your face.

I wish for this headache to go away...

Granted, it goes away for 5 seconds.

I wish the 'PfL incident' hadn't happened, and everything was back to normal with Chobit leading her fan-work empire.

Granted ,but a grand scheme occurs in a moth shutting it down.

I wish more KSP players were on BLOC.

Granted, but we are later taken over along with every other nation on BLOC by the GGU.

I wish that everything was illegal.

Granted ,but there is no ponit since making things would itself be illegal.

I wish The mainsail Intiative became know.(Also the forums are finding out were are a space faring race)
